com.tractrac.model.lib.api.route

Interface IControl

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAttachable, IIdentifiable, IMetadataContainer, INamed, IPropertiesContainer, com.tractrac.util.lib.api.serialize.ISerializable

    public interface IControl
extends INamed, IMetadataContainer, com.tractrac.util.lib.api.serialize.ISerializable

    A mark/waypoint/control that has to be visited as a part of a route. If the route is a IControlRoute it will be composed of controls.

    Each control is composed by one or more physical IControlPoints.

    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Jesper Grooss

        java.lang.String getShortName()

      • isMultiple

        boolean isMultiple()
        Flag specifying whether the control is composed by more than one individual control points.
        Returns:
        true if the control is multiple.

      • getControlPoints

        java.util.List<IControlPoint> getControlPoints()

        Gets the list of control points contained by this control.

        This method is thread-safety: it returns a copy of the list.

        Returns:
        a list of control points.
